title: I got kicked from my club but my friends still see me in the club
body:
Hey Riot
When I log into my account it shows that I am no longer part of the club that I am the owner of, But when my friends sign in they see that I'm in the club (still the owner) and offline. Even when I'm online it still shows that I'm offline in the club chat room. Also I no longer have the club tag near my name either. Riot please fix this.

replies.body:
Hey there,

You'll have to [contact Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) about this issue as we here on the boards cannot assist with account specific inquiries.
